name: webm2mp4
description: A telegram bot that converts WebM files to MP4.

TELEGRAMKEY.description: The API key for your bot given to you from @BotFather.

MAXSIZEBYTES.description: Filesize limit of a webm in bytes. Files larger than this will not be converted.

APPURL.description: Application URL is needed for webhook. Otherwise will work in polling mode and sleep much.
